price: 3. Laisse-les manger, profiter des jouissances éphémères et se nourrir d’illusions. Bientôt ils sauront !
arabic: ذَرۡهُمۡ يَأۡكُلُواْ وَيَتَمَتَّعُواْ وَيُلۡهِهِمُ ٱلۡأَمَلُۖ فَسَوۡفَ يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: dharhum yakulū wayatamattaʿū wayul'hihimu al-amalu fasawfa yaʿlamūna
